name: Black Bean Corn Avocado Salad
description: Black Bean Corn Avocado Salad is full of fresh summer produce and is a real crowd pleaser at potlucks and summer barbecues! This hearty salad has a simple lime-cumin-maple vinaigrette dressing and is fun served with tortilla chips or romaine lettuce leaves.
recipeIngredient: (2) 15-ounce cans black beans (or 3 cups cooked), drained and rinsed
3/4 teaspoon salt, or more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, add the black beans, corn, avocados, tomatoes and cilantro.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, add the black beans, corn, avocados, tomatoes and cilantro.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, whisk together the fresh squeezed lime juice, pure maple syrup, cumin and salt.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small bowl, whisk together the fresh squeezed lime juice, pure maple syrup, cumin and salt.

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle the dressing over the beans and vegetables, and then toss to combine everything together.
recipeInstructions.name: Drizzle the dressing over the beans and vegetables, and then toss to combine everything together.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste for salt, and serve with tortilla chips or romaine lettuce leaves.
